title: Factory Foreman

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Demotion!- (Night) [Cheat] Target a player and choose a consecutive range of 10 player numbers. While you are alive, the original target will be Astrally roleblocked if they attempt to target anyone not in that range of 10 with an ability.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Worker’s Compensation (Passive) Every time a Cog dies, your Factional Attack and Defense each increase by 1 tier.
-You may only have one player Demoted at a time.
-A demoted player will not know that they were Demoted.

desc:
Post 4025
*We’ve got work to do, gentlemen.*
